DOC.criteria: Males females Obese subject ( body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m^2 ) 18 65 year Blood pressure read < 140/80 mm Hg prior history hypertension History diabetes mellitus History hypertension Fasting triglyceride level > 250 mg/dL Liver disease ( ALT 2.5x > upper limit normal ) Serum creatinine ≥1.5 mg/dL Smokers , drug alcohol abuse Mental condition render subject unable understand scope possible consequence study Female subject pregnant breast feeding
